text: geuleona noyega eobsneun janeun dong chimhagi jeon-e gyesoghayeo du dal-eul dansighage hago geuleohgedo hal su eobsneunjaneun gulmjulin ja yugsibmyeong-eul baebulli meog-ige hala igeos-eun neohuilo hayeo geum hananimgwa geubun-ui seonjijaleul mid dolog ham-e iss-eumyeo ttohan igeosdeul-i hananim-ui gyubeom-ila geuleona bulsinjadeul-egeneun gotongseuleoun eungbeol-i iss-eulppun-ila
